verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> an apostle<WG652> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> by<WG1223> the will<WG2307> of God,<WG2316> according<WG2596> to the promise<WG1860> of life<WG2222> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus,<WG2424>

To Timothy,<WG5095> my dearly beloved<WG27> son:<WG5043> Grace,<WG5485> mercy,<WG1656> and peace,<WG1515> from<WG575> God<WG2316> the Father<WG3962> and<WG2532> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> our<WG2257> Lord.<WG2962>

I thank<WG2192> <WG5485> God,<WG2316> whom<WG3739> I serve<WG3000> from<WG575> my forefathers<WG4269> with<WG1722> pure<WG2513> conscience,<WG4893> that<WG5613> without ceasing<WG88> I have<WG2192> remembrance<WG3417> of<WG4012> thee<WG4675> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> prayers<WG1162> night<WG3571> and<WG2532> day;<WG2250>
Greatly desiring<WG1971> to see<WG1492> thee,<WG4571> being mindful<WG3415> of thy<WG4675> tears,<WG1144> that<WG2443> I may be filled<WG4137> with joy;<WG5479>

When I call<WG2983> to remembrance<WG5280> the<WG3588> unfeigned<WG505> faith<WG4102> that<WG3588> is in<WG1722> thee,<WG4671> which<WG3748> dwelt<WG1774> first<WG4412> in<WG1722> thy<WG4675> grandmother<WG3125> Lois,<WG3090> and<WG2532> thy<WG4675> mother<WG3384> Eunice;<WG2131> and<WG1161> I am persuaded<WG3982> that<WG3754> in<WG1722> thee<WG4671> also.<WG2532>

Wherefore <WG1223> <WG3739> <WG156> I put thee in remembrance<WG363> <WG4671> that thou stir up<WG329> the<WG3588> gift<WG5486> of God,<WG2316> which<WG3739> is<WG2076> in<WG1722> thee<WG4671> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> putting on<WG1936> of my<WG3450> hands.<WG5495>
For <WG1063> God<WG2316> hath not<WG3756> given<WG1325> us<WG2254> the spirit<WG4151> of fear;<WG1167> but<WG235> of power,<WG1411> and<WG2532> of love,<WG26> and<WG2532> of a sound mind.<WG4995>

Be not<WG3361> thou therefore<WG3767> ashamed<WG1870> of the<WG3588> testimony<WG3142> of our<WG2257> Lord,<WG2962> nor<WG3366> of me<WG1691> his<WG846> prisoner:<WG1198> but<WG235> be thou partaker of the afflictions<WG4777> of the<WG3588> gospel<WG2098> according<WG2596> to the power<WG1411> of God;<WG2316>

Who hath saved<WG4982> us,<WG2248> and<WG2532> called<WG2564> us with a holy<WG40> calling,<WG2821> not<WG3756> according<WG2596> to our<WG2257> works,<WG2041> but<WG235> according<WG2596> to his own<WG2398> purpose<WG4286> and<WG2532> grace,<WG5485> which was given<WG1325> us<WG2254> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> before<WG4253> the world began,<WG5550> <WG166>

But <WG1161> is now<WG3568> made manifest<WG5319> by<WG1223> the<WG3588> appearing<WG2015> of our<WG2257> Savior<WG4990> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> who hath abolished<WG2673> <WG3303> death,<WG2288> and<WG1161> hath brought life and immortality to light<WG5461> <WG2222> <WG2532> <WG861> through<WG1223> the<WG3588> gospel: <WG2098>
Whereunto <WG1519> <WG3739> I<WG1473> am appointed<WG5087> a preacher,<WG2783> and<WG2532> an apostle,<WG652> and<WG2532> a teacher<WG1320> of the Gentiles.<WG1484>

For <WG1223> the which<WG3739> cause<WG156> I also<WG2532> suffer<WG3958> these things:<WG5023> nevertheless<WG235> I am not<WG3756> ashamed:<WG1870> for<WG1063> I know<WG1492> whom<WG3739> I have believed,<WG4100> and<WG2532> am persuaded<WG3982> that<WG3754> he is<WG2076> able<WG1415> to keep<WG5442> that which I have committed unto him<WG3866> <WG3450> against<WG1519> that<WG1565> day.<WG2250>

Hold fast<WG2192> the form<WG5296> of sound<WG5198> words,<WG3056> which<WG3739> thou hast heard<WG191> of<WG3844> me,<WG1700> in<WG1722> faith<WG4102> and<WG2532> love<WG26> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>
That good thing<WG2570> which was committed unto thee<WG3872> keep<WG5442> by<WG1223> the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> which dwelleth<WG1774> in<WG1722> us.<WG2254>

This <WG5124> thou knowest,<WG1492> that<WG3754> all<WG3956> they which<WG3588> are in<WG1722> Asia<WG773> be turned away from<WG654> me;<WG3165> of whom<WG3739> are<WG2076> Phygellus<WG5436> and<WG2532> Hermogenes.<WG2061>

The <WG3588> Lord<WG2962> give<WG1325> mercy<WG1656> unto the<WG3588> house<WG3624> of Onesiphorus;<WG3683> for<WG3754> he oft<WG4178> refreshed<WG404> me,<WG3165> and<WG2532> was not<WG3756> ashamed<WG1870> of my<WG3450> chain: <WG254>
But, <WG235> when he was<WG1096> in<WG1722> Rome,<WG4516> he sought me out<WG2212> <WG3165> very diligently,<WG4706> and<WG2532> found<WG2147> me.

The <WG3588> Lord<WG2962> grant<WG1325> unto him<WG846> that he may find<WG2147> mercy<WG1656> of<WG3844> the Lord<WG2962> in<WG1722> that<WG1565> day:<WG2250> and<WG2532> in how many things<WG3745> he ministered unto<WG1247> me at<WG1722> Ephesus,<WG2181> thou<WG4771> knowest<WG1097> very well.<WG957>
